channel.title: Mobile on D0CUM3NTN4T10N
channel.description: Recent content in Mobile on D0CUM3NTN4T10N

item.title: Connect to Android Device from PC using SSH
item.description: 1. Preparation link1. Create SSH Private/Public Key Pair on Linux Machine linkIn our machine, we need to generate SSH key pair for connecting to SSH server of Android device. After running the following command, there’s no problem with no passphrase if it’s for testing purpose. ssh-keygen -t ed25519 -f id_ed25519_android After that, store the generated files (id_25519_android, id_25519_android.pub) into ~/.ssh folder. # If `.ssh` directory does not exist, create a new one.

item.title: Android Pentesting
item.description: APK Analysis link1. Extract APK File to DEX File linkYou can retrieve “classes.dex”. unzip example.apk -d ./Example Now you can observe files. For React Native, it may contain the sensitive information in the bundle file. strings assets/index.android.bundle 2. Convert DEX to JAR linkYou can retrieve JAR file. d2j-dex2jar classes.dex 3. Observation linkJD-GUI is a JAVA decompiler tool. It reveals class in the JAR file. Open JD-GUI. jd-gui Static Analysis link # Decode APK file apktool d example.
